summary: This document is an email communication from Amanda Kirby regarding a meeting request from Jeffrey Epstein to discuss account management with the Deutsche Bank team. It highlights the scheduling of a meeting for the week of October 8, 2013, when Epstein is expected to return to New York City.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting for Jeffrey Epstein with the Deutsche Bank team.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein requested a meeting with the Deutsche Bank team to manage his accounts.

persons.name: Harry
persons.context: Harry informed Amanda Kirby about Epstein's request for a meeting.

persons.name: Paul
persons.context: Paul is mentioned as part of the Deutsche Bank team that will be managing Epstein's accounts.

persons.name: Lesley
persons.context: Lesley is the recipient of the email and is being asked to confirm Epstein's availability for the meeting.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby is coordinating on behalf of Deutsche Bank for client Jeffrey Epstein.
Harry informed Amanda Kirby about Epstein's request for a meeting.
Amanda is communicating with Lesley regarding scheduling a meeting for Epstein.

events.title: Meeting Request
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein requested a meeting with the Deutsche Bank team to discuss account management.
